name: Cult of the Apocalypse
description:
Welcome to "Cult of the Apocalypse", a post-apocalyptic survival game where you take on the role of a cult leader. In a world ravaged by disaster, it's up to you to guide your followers to safety and establish a new settlement.

As the leader of your cult, you must scavenge for resources, recruit new members, and make strategic decisions to ensure the survival of your settlement. Explore the ruins of the old world and scavenge for supplies, but beware, other survivors may not be as friendly and may try to steal your resources. Unlock new technologies and upgrades to strengthen your settlement and protect your cult from the impending doom. But time is running out - you have 30 Days to build a Doomsday Bunker before your mysterious prophecy will happen.
